import React from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { slice } from 'lodash'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import Proud from '../components/Proud'; import hero from '../assets/img/hero.jpg'; import olga from '../assets/img/olga.png'; function Home() { const [advantages, setAdvantages] = React.useState([]); const [products, setProducts] = React.useState([]); React.useEffect(() => { const getAdvantages = async () => { const res = await axios.get(`${process.env.REACT_APP_API}/advantages`); setAdvantages(res.data); }; const getProducts = async () => { const res = await axios.get(`${process.env.REACT_APP_API}/advantages`); setProducts(res.data); }; getAdvantages(); getProducts(); }, [advantages]); const displayProducts = slice(products, 0, 8); return (
